---
title: Population data
output: github_document
---

The purpose of this document is to write out the 2019 estimate for the population of Iowa counties. 

The source of this data is the [Iowa Community Indicators Program](https://www.icip.iastate.edu/tables/population/counties-estimates).

```{r packages}
library("fs")
library("magrittr")
library("iowa.covid")
library("tibble")
library("readr")
```

```{r dir}
dir_create("data")

dir_target <- path("data", "population")
dir_create(dir_target)
```

```{r}
iowa_county_population %>%
  glimpse()
```

```{r}
write_csv(
  iowa_county_population, 
  path(dir_target, "iowa_county_population.csv")
)
```
